short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Replaces all no-participation links on Reddit to their regular version

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Make sure that you know what no-participation links are and why they exist before installing!

This extension replaces all NP links on Reddit to their normal counterparts so that you aren't just talking to the wall. Replaced links are marked with "(-NP)" when you hover over them to remind you to keep the original peace in the community.
